trans-unit.source: Determines the serialization method used for a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" /> object.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings.SerializeAs%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings> object controls the serialization mode for a single profile property setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings.SerializeAs%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings> 개체를 단일 프로필 속성 설정에 대 한 serialization 모드를 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings.SerializeAs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings.SerializeAs%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는에 대해 제공 된 큰 예제의 일부는 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" /> object is serialized using binary serialization.
The provider has implicit knowledge of the type and is responsible for deciding how to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" /> object into the data store.
trans-unit.target: 공급자는 형식을 암시적으로 인식하며 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" /> 개체를 데이터 저장소에 serialize하는 방법을 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" /> object is serialized to a simple string.
The profile <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" /> is serialized as XML using XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: 프로필 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings" />는 XML serialization을 사용하여 XML로 serialize됩니다.
